name: Item Disabler
author: Kivitoe
info: This script displays a message on the screen when Link walks on the ffc.
description: This script displays a message on the screen when Link walks on the ffc and uses an item. Great for advanced message showing! WARNING: DO NOT PUT THE FFC WHERE THE MESSAGE IS DISPLAYED! LINK WILL GET TRAPPED!
setup: D0 - String number.Place an ffc on a ground tile (Preferably near a guy). Then, select this script in the script slot.
